Historical/Biographical Note
Hertz Burgin (b. 1870) was the author of Die Geshiskhte fun der Idisher Arbayter Bevegung in Amerika, Rusland un England (Feraynigte idishe geverkshaften, New York, 1915), i.e.."The History of the Jewish Labor Movement.
Scope and Content Note
Contains a typescript, "History of the Jewish Labor Movement," "translated from the Yiddish by a student assistant" (1962; 301 pp.).
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Hertz Burgin was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
